scripts.copy.ios: cp -R gradient*.js ../demo/node_modules/nativescript-gradient && cd ../demo && tns run ios --syncAllFiles
scripts.copy.android: cp -R gradient*.js ../demo/node_modules/nativescript-gradient && cd ../demo && tns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd ../demo && tns run ios --emulator
scripts.demo.ng.ios: npm run preparedemong && cd ../demo-ng && tns run ios --emulator
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo && cd ../demo && tns run android
scripts.demo.ng.android: npm run preparedemong && cd ../demo-ng && tns run android
scripts.debug.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd ../demo && tns debug ios
scripts.debug.android: npm run preparedemo && cd ../demo && tns debug android
scripts.nuke: rm -rf node_modules && cd ../demo && rm -rf node_modules platforms hooks && cd ../demo-ng && rm -rf node_modules platforms hooks && cd ../src
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-gradient; tns plugin add ../src && tns install
scripts.preparedemong: npm run build && cd ../demo-ng && tns plugin remove nativescript-gradient; tns plugin add ../src && tns install
scripts.setup: npm i && cd ../demo && npm i && cd ../demo-ng && npm i && cd ../src
scripts.test: npm run tslint && npm run tslint.demo && npm run tslint.demo.ng
